tag_list: data, datamarket, azure, odata, -net, visual-studio, developer-tools, visual-langauges, metadata
overview:
Shoshanna Budzianowski is a Partner Group Program Manager for Windows Azure Marketplace DataMarket. In her fifteen year career at Microsoft, Shoshanna has focused on unlocking the potential of data for all users â€“ from the tools developers use to design databases, to approachable query design tools for information workers, to repositories and metadata solutions supporting the application lifecycle, and now to data itself.

Shoshanna has a B.S. and an M.S. in Computer Science. Her experience in the software industry, prior to joining Microsoft includes diagram-driven expert systems for criminal intelligence solutions, visual programming languages, and analog and digital authoring systems.
